overview.en: QTM high quality technology mobile live video, QTM will build a social e-commerce live video system based on blockchain + 5G technology, dedicated to solve the 'small and medium-sized merchants private domain traffic, ordinary graphics and text is difficult to establish user trust' short board problem. The new ecological development of the industry is characterized by distribution, randomness, interactivity, participation, marketization, etc. The distributed, fair, open and transparent use of block chain technology by QTM will become an important technical solution to meet the challenges of the new ecological industry in the future.
overview.zh: QTM高质量技术移动直播视频，QTM将基于区块链+5G技术打造一个社交电商直播系统，致力于解决“中小型商家私域流量中，普通图文难以建立用户信任”的短板问题。在行业的新生态发展表现为分布式、随机性、互动性、参与性、市场化等特点，Q·TM使用区块链技术的分布式、公平性、公开性以及透明性将成为应对未来行业新生态的挑战的重要技术解决方案。
